title: Reflect Negative Energy With a Return to Sender Spell

steps.title: Write your intentions for the spell on a piece of paper.
steps.content: Write your intentions for the spell on a piece of paper. Are you getting unwanted attention you need to reflect? Do you want to reverse a spell that’s been cast on you? Meditate on the problem you’re facing and decide how you want it to be resolved. When you figure out what exactly you want, write it down on a piece of paper. For example, you could write “[Person]’s actions will only affect themself” or “[Person] will have their energy reflected back to them.”

steps.title: Place 9 black candles around a cauldron.
steps.content: Place 9 black candles around a cauldron. If you have an altar (or any dedicated spellcrafting area) set up your workspace there. If not, a cleared off table is perfectly fine. Set the candles in a circle and place a cauldron in the middle. [1] X Research source Black candles are considered magically protective. If you don’t have a cauldron, use a fireproof bowl. Odd numbers are considered powerful in spellcrafting.

steps.title: Light the candles starting with the one closest to you.
steps.content: Light the candles starting with the one closest to you. Keep lighting the candles from the center (first the one in front of you, then the two on either side, then the two on either side of those, etc.) and meditate on your intention for the spell. Spend a moment on each candle thinking about what you want.

steps.title: Fill the bottom of the cauldron with charged herbs.
steps.content: Fill the bottom of the cauldron with charged herbs. Herbs such as basil, rosemary, sage, mint, and juniper are thought to cleanse and banish negative energy. Imbue the herbs with your energy by holding them in your hands and focusing on your intentions for the spell. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the paper you wrote on in the cauldron.
steps.content: Place the paper you wrote on in the cauldron. Fold the paper up and tie it with a piece of string. Then, rest the paper gently on top of the herbs.

steps.title: State your intentions out loud.
steps.content: State your intentions out loud. Clear your mind of everything except what you want from the spell, then speak it out loud. Imagine the negative energy in your life sinking into the herbs and being sent back to where it came from. Extinguish each of the candles and imagine the spell being sealed and negative energies dispersed. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Dispose of the spell ingredients.
steps.content: Dispose of the spell ingredients. Use a long match or stick to light the paper and herbs on fire. Let everything burn, then bury the ashes outside. Be sure to wait until the ashes cool completely before burying them.

steps.title: Light incense and a black candle.
steps.content: Light incense and a black candle. Use [1] to encourage spiritual strength and to cleanse the energy around you. Watch the smoke of the incense and think about the negativity you’re receiving and who you’d like to send it back to. Light the black candle when you’re sure of what you want from the spell. Spells work through the intentions put into them. Think specifically about what you want from this spell. Do you want someone to leave you alone entirely or do you want someone to just see the effects of their actions?

steps.title: Stick 6 cloves in 2 lemon halves.
steps.content: Stick 6 cloves in 2 lemon halves. Cut a lemon in half and stick 3 cloves into either side. [4] X Research source Lemons are considered to have powerful energetic and protective properties. They can also be used to send sour energy . The cloves are protective herbs thought to send energy back out.

steps.title: Think about your intentions while saying the incantation.
steps.content: Think about your intentions while saying the incantation. Hold your intentions in your mind and say the following words: “The pain you caused is now your own.” [5] X Research source You can repeat the incantation several times if you'd like until you feel ready to proceed.

steps.title: Put the lemon in a container under your bed.
steps.content: Put the lemon in a container under your bed. The lemon absorbs negative energy coming your way and the cloves send it back out. Blow out the candles to release the spell and keep the lemon under your bed until you see it start working.

steps.title: Call spirits to your aid by ringing a bell.
steps.content: Call spirits to your aid by ringing a bell. This spell relies on spiritual entities to help send that negativity back. Ring a bell to get their attention and say “I am immune to their hate and malice, I do not accept their guilt, their actions are no bane to me.” [6] X Research source

steps.title: Light a black candle in front of a mirror.
steps.content: Light a black candle in front of a mirror. Black candles are classically used for protection magic. When lighting the candle, say “As this mirror reflects the light of this candle, so shall these negative energies be reflected back to their senders. The mirror neither adds nor subtracts from the reflection, and I so too add no extra malice. So it comes to me, I return to them.” [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tie 3 knots in a black string.
steps.content: Tie 3 knots in a black string. To bind this spell to its intended recipient, use a black string to symbolically tie the spell in place. As you tie each knot, say “With this string I bind this spell.” [8] X Research source

steps.title: Dismiss the spirits and put the string in a box.
steps.content: Dismiss the spirits and put the string in a box. Thank the spirits for their help and let them know they can leave. Tell them, “I am grateful for your blessings, you are needed no more.” Put the string in a box and seal it tightly. Leave the string in the box until the spell has worked, then burn the box. Let the candle go out on its own. Blowing it out will release the energy of the spell and affect its efficacy.

steps.title: Clear the energy from a small mirror.
steps.content: Clear the energy from a small mirror. Mirrors are highly magical objects, reflecting energy and absorbing what comes in front of them. Smudge the mirror with smoke to be sure it’s totally free of outside energy. Let smoke waft over every part of the mirror, then wash it with salt water to further purify it. Leave it out in the sun to dry completely.</ref> Common herbs for cleansing are sage, rosemary, and lavender. White sage is renowned for its magical properties, but most white sage for sale has been illegally harvested. While buying white sage isn’t recommended, you can grow it yourself at home or substitute it for garden sage.

steps.title: Place your mirror against a window.
steps.content: Place your mirror against a window. To protect yourself from and to reflect further negative energy, rest the mirror facing out against a window.

steps.title: Cast a circle of protection around a black candle.
steps.content: Cast a circle of protection around a black candle. Make an unbroken circle around yourself and the candle with a line of salt. While you’re in the circle, point your body towards each of the cardinal directions and say “I cast this circle to protect myself, keep out evil and let in love.”

steps.title: Kneel in front of the candle and light it.
steps.content: Kneel in front of the candle and light it. Look into the flame and visualize it gathering the negative energy. Say: “Negative energy sent my way, the mirror reflects and the sender repays.” Close your eyes and imagine the mirror gathering energy from the candle and sending it back to the troublemaker you’re targeting.

steps.title: Open the circle to end the spell.
steps.content: Open the circle to end the spell. Face each cardinal direction again and say “The circle is open,” then break the line of salt with your foot and sweep up. Let the candle burn down completely, then bury the remains. Leave the mirror in your window to keep reflecting negativity. The spell is thought to dissipate if you blow the candle out. If you need to put it out for safety reasons, use a candle snuffer or a large glass to keep the energy from dispersing.

steps.title: Smoke cleanse yourself and a small mirror.
steps.content: Smoke cleanse yourself and a small mirror. Smudge a protective herb , like rosemary, sage, or lavender to clear the energies out of your body and spellcasting area. Bring a smudge stick down in front of your body, from head to toe, and let yourself be covered by the smoke. Hold a small mirror in the smoke to clean it for your spell, then lay it on the floor. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Rub a black candle down your body, from head to foot.
steps.content: Rub a black candle down your body, from head to foot. Use a black candle (for protection) to gather any negative energy from your body. [10] X Research source Imagine the energy as a cloth you’re rolling up on the candle, or a film that you’re scraping off.

steps.title: Light the candle on top of the mirror.
steps.content: Light the candle on top of the mirror. Put the candle in the center of the mirror and light it. Look into the flame and say “Black as night, candle bright, burn the magic sent my way. Return it to its sender” 13 times. [11] X Research source Allow the candle to go out on its own.

steps.title: Bury the remnants of the spell.
steps.content: Bury the remnants of the spell. Once the candle is fully burnt down and cooled, take it off the mirror and bury it far away from your house. You can keep the mirror for future return to sender spells as long as you smoke cleanse it again.
